name: Timothy Brits
bio: Software engineer from Pretoria specialising in .NET and Node.js. I (usually) build maintainable web apps. I enjoy coding, audiobooks, gaming, and chess. Passionate about mental health, inclusivity, and socialism. My heart is with Ukraine, Sudan, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, and Palestine.
